TopicTitle: [0.25]Odysseus STS Block V - Accurate Stock Space Shuttle (Over 2000 Downloads!)

Articles.Content:
Are you going to upscale the Odysseus to match the Mk-3 parts or keep it at its current size?

I'm keeping the Odysseus as is (but with a new nose section) and I'm also making a bigger one. I'm not very good at building big, so this could be a challenge.

I'm keeping the Odysseus as is (but with a new nose section) and I'm also making a bigger one. I'm not very good at building big, so this could be a challenge. [/quote

Ah that's good. I like its current size. It will also keep it different to the incoming wave of shuttle clones...

I'm keeping the Odysseus as is (but with a new nose section) and I'm also making a bigger one. I'm not very good at building big, so this could be a challenge.

Ah that's good. I like its current size. It will also keep it different to the incoming wave of shuttle clones...

Well, I plan on making one of those Shuttle clones, and I fully plan on it being awesome too. We'll see which one ends up flying better, and better yet, learn form each other's design solutions!

Rune. The DL link finally started. SO hyped.

Well, I plan on making one of those Shuttle clones, and I fully plan on it being awesome too. We'll see which one ends up flying better, and better yet, learn form each other's design solutions!

Rune. The DL link finally started. SO hyped.

Can't wait to see yours! The challenge right now with the Odysseus is to keep the part count below 200. The updated version has 199 parts!

I'm having aerodynamic problems with the orbiter though. One mistake and it'll enter a spiral dive. It's probably associated with the vertical stabilizer, which I'll look into when I have the time.

I found an issue already with the new shuttle pod..

When in the SPH and using VAB symmetry trying to make a custom nose from struts, this happens....

The same issue in the VAB....

*edit

I found a way round it so no biggie.

Edited December 16, 2014 by Majorjim
What do you mean your keeping it the same? You have to make it carry 2.5m parts surely!?!

What do you mean your keeping it the same? You have to make it carry 2.5m parts surely!?!

I'm planning on building a new shuttle with mk3 parts to carry larger payloads. Meanwhile, I'm working on replacing the nose of the Odysseus Orbiter so it works in 0.90.

Alas, I don't have the time right now to do either.
